name: Glitchiana Jones and The Temple of Random
name_original: Glitchiana Jones and The Temple of Random
description:
Glitchiana Jonas and The Temple of Random is a single player infinite runner where the player has to unravel the mysterious Temple of Random. Unfold the Secrets, encounter ancient magic and make brilliant use of your Glitchpower(yes, you can do slow-mo!) to handle the chaos.

we hope you guys have the same random experience we had during the jam! :)

This game is being creating during the GMTK Jam 2020 with the topic out of control.

All assets were created by friends and helpers (thanks to Jakob and Levin!) or taken from the asset store.

Game Design: Lukas Roloff
Tech Design: Sebastian Gsänger
Programming: Maxi Karnstedt
